sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const Productscreen = (props) => { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); setProducts(axios.get("/products")); console.log(products); var product = products.find((x) => x.id == props.match.params.id); setProducts(product); console.log(products); return ( <>

{products.item}

Price : {products.amount}
Ratings : 2.5 / 5
Price : {products.amount}
Ratings : 2.5 / 5

State : In stock

); }; export default Productscreen;
